name: 2018-3rd International Conderence on Masterials Engineering and Nanotechnology ICMEN
content: Conference official website：http://www.icmen.org Meeting time：July 19-21, 2018 Meeting place：Tokyo, Japan Published by：All submissions will be peer reviewed by 2-3reviewers.The registered and presented papers will be published into Materials Science Forum Indexed by Elsevier: SCOPUS,Ei Compendex(CPX) ICMEN2016 are indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus. Paper Submission: June 20, 2018 Submission instructions： 1.Prospective authors anr invited to submit original,high quality papers which is original and has not been submitted and published elsewhere 2.Manuscripts should be at least 4 full pages and at most 10pages. 3.The reviewing process of the ICMEN conference aims to provide authors with constructive feedback in their papers,eveb when a submission is rejected.All submissions will be subjected to double-blind peer reviews,who are expert or hace been experiencing in the related field for years.The accepted papers must be revised,taking into consideration the referees’ comments and suggestions,before inclusion in the conference proceedings. Conference Contact: Ms.Echo J.Nie mailbox: icmen@zhconf.ac.cn
